title: Big Data Researcher
skills:
1. I am fluent in English, including technical and business, have experience in communication, translation and business correspondence, as well as writing technical and contract documentation.
2. I am consistent in my actions, I approach problems systematically.
3. Open to the acquisition of new knowledge, easy to teach, have a craving for knowledge.
4. I constantly use Excel and Word, email, messengers... I have experience in graphic editors (CorelDRAW, Adobe Photoshop), design programs (AutoCAD, T-Flex CAD), as well as 1C Trade Management. Now I am very actively studying Python, Machine Learning, Data Science, SQL, PowerBI...
5. I have a driver's license of the ABC categories, continuous experience since 2001, a personal car.
6. An active life position, awareness in decision-making, hard work, the ability to bring what has been started to the end.
7. I have an interest in creative problem solving and business process optimization. I did a lot of analytics while managing businesses.
8. Honest, direct, diplomatic, sociable, conflict-free, friendly, while I can correctly, firmly and argumentatively defend my position/interests of the company.
9. Orthodox Christian, married, three children.
10. I love sports - football, cycling, racing, fishing, just walking, traveling. I sometimes like to dig into auto-moto equipment, build/put in order something at home or at the country.
